title: Project Setup
description: Initialize the project structure for PersonalPortfolio using basic HTML, CSS, and JS. Create folders for assets, images, styles, scripts, and pages.
acceptance_criteria: Project folder contains index.html, /assets, /images, /styles, /scripts directories.
Basic HTML boilerplate with metadata (title, description, keywords) added.
Git repository initialized for version control.

title: Global Layout and Navigation
description: Create a responsive layout with header, navigation bar, main content area, and footer. Ensure smooth scrolling and navigation between sections/pages.
acceptance_criteria: Header includes site logo or name and navigation links (Home, Projects, About, Contact).
Navigation links anchor correctly to sections or navigate between pages.
Responsive design for mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Active state highlighting for current section.

title: Hero Section Implementation
description: Develop the hero section with name/title, tagline, profile/background image, and a call-to-action button.
acceptance_criteria: Hero section is visually prominent and responsive.
Contains name/title, short tagline, and CTA button (e.g., 'View Projects').
Includes background or profile image with optimized loading.
CTA scrolls smoothly to projects section or navigates to Projects page.

title: About Me Section
description: Add section describing the individual’s bio, skills, experience, and a downloadable resume link.
acceptance_criteria: Section includes profile picture, bio paragraph, and skills summary list.
Downloadable resume link provided (PDF format).
Layout adapts to mobile and desktop viewports.
Consistent typography and spacing per design guidelines.

title: Projects Gallery Section
description: Create a projects gallery to showcase project thumbnails, titles, short descriptions, and links to live demos or GitHub repositories.
acceptance_criteria: Each project displayed as a card with image, title, description, and links.
Cards arranged in responsive grid layout.
Optional filtering or categorization implemented via JavaScript.
Hover effects or animations for interactivity.

title: Contact Form Section
description: Implement a functional contact form allowing users to send messages with validation and success/error feedback.
acceptance_criteria: Form includes fields: Name, Email, Message, and Submit button.
Client-side validation for required fields and email format.
Success and error messages displayed clearly after submission.
Form submission handled via EmailJS or mock JS handler (no backend required).

title: Footer and Social Media Links
description: Design and implement a footer containing copyright notice and social media links.
acceptance_criteria: Footer includes © symbol with current year and name.
Social media icons (e.g., GitHub, LinkedIn, Twitter) link to external profiles.
Responsive layout and accessible link contrast maintained.

title: Accessibility and SEO Enhancements
description: Ensure site meets WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility and SEO best practices.
acceptance_criteria: All images include alt text.
Color contrast meets accessibility standards.
Keyboard navigation works across all interactive elements.
Meta tags (title, description, keywords) correctly set.
Semantic HTML tags used appropriately (header, main, section, footer).

title: Responsive Design and Styling
description: Apply consistent color scheme, typography, and spacing across all sections using CSS or a minimal utility framework.
acceptance_criteria: Color scheme matches light background with accent color (e.g., blue/teal).
Fonts: sans-serif for headings and readable body font.
Responsive breakpoints for common device sizes implemented.
Smooth scrolling and section spacing visually balanced.

title: Deployment Setup
description: Prepare and deploy the site to a static hosting platform (Netlify, Vercel, or GitHub Pages).
acceptance_criteria: Build folder structure works with chosen static host.
Deployment tested and accessible via public URL.
Contact form integration verified post-deployment.
README includes deployment instructions and project overview.

title: Testing and Final Review
description: Perform testing for responsiveness, accessibility, form functionality, and cross-browser compatibility.
acceptance_criteria: Site tested on Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and mobile browsers.
All links and navigation verified to work correctly.
Form tested for various input scenarios.
All console errors resolved and performance optimized.
